listitem.para: Layout type: Default layout type for this project:
Default: Default type is TABLE
Table: Generates the layout using HTML TABLE tags
AP Tableless: Generates the layout using HTML DIV tags with Absolute Positioning
Add: Adds a new file (image)
Edit: Edits the selected file (change the image data)
Remove: Removes the selected file
Show preview: When checked, selecting a file will show a preview
Add: Adds a new mask
Edit: Edits the selected mask
Remove: Removes the selected mask
Duplicate: Duplicate the selected mask
Name: Mask name
Width: Mask width in pixels
Height: Mask height in pixels
Add: Adds a new view
Edit: Edits the selected view
Remove: Removes the selected view
Name: View name
Layout type: The output layout type for this view - DEFAULT will use the project options setting.
File: View image file
Mask: View mask
Image path: Path for this view's images
Filename: View filename (e.g.: index.html)
Encoding: Output file encoding
Items: Items to generate when saving this view:
HTML: Generate a HTML file
Images: Generate the area image files
Images Global: Generate the global area image files
Assorted file groups: Assorted files from the selected groups will be copied to the VIEW image output folder
CSS: Shortcut to edit the VIEW selected CSS file - if no CSS file is selected, does nothing
CSS file: CSS file to use in this VIEW - a CSS include will be generated on the HTML page
Background image: Image to be used on the body background (<BODY background="image">)
Background repeat: Background image repetition option
Background color: Body background color
Stretchable layout: Mark the view as generating a stretchable HTML page
Body tag add: Smart attributes to be added to the <BODY> tag
Title: HTML page title
Head: HTML inside the <HEAD> tag
Table tag add: Smart attributes to be added to the root <TABLE> tag
Body prepend: Text to append right after the <BODY> tag
Body append: Text to append right before the </BODY> tag
Alternate file 1..8: Numbered alternate image files for the view
Name: Area name (optional)
Kind: Area kind:
None: Empty table cell
Image: Image inside table cell (or as cell background)
Mask: Sub-mask inside area (HTML table inside an outer table cell)
Background image: If checked, the image will be set as the cell's background, instead of a tag

Layout type: The output layout type for this AREA's inner MASK - DEFAULT will use the VIEW setting. This can be different from the VIEW setting - if so, the generated page will use a mixed table/AP tableless layout (only available if Kind is MASK)
Image map: Area can contain an image map
Imap map name: Image map name
Base filename: Base filename for the generated image file (without extension)

Prepend parent area filename: If checked, the image file name will prepend recursivelly the parent areas filenames, and the view name, in the filename. if not checked, the image file name will be the base filename plus the file extension.
Use alternate file: Use the selected alternate image, instead of the default MASK image
Image formats: Image formats maintenance, with AREA image preview
Align: Cell ALIGN property
Vertical align: Cell VALIGN property
Background repeat: Background repetition option (only if background image)
Inner scrollable: If checked, puts a <DIV> inside the table cell
Cell tag append: <TD>/<DIV> tag smart attributes
Table tag append: Inner <TABLE> tag smart attributes (only if Kind is MASK)
Background color: Cell background color
Variable size: If checked, cell will not have a WIDTH attribute
Content: HTML inside the <TD> tag
Image URL: URL for the image
Image URL target: Target attribute for the URL link
Image tag append: tag smart attributes
Image source: Area image source:
Default: The default area image
Image link: The image from the link selected below
Image link: Image to use for the image source
Positions:
Left, Top, Right, Bottom: Pixel positions of the LINEs that define the AREA
Movement:
Left/Top: Moves Left/Right or Top/Bottom LINEs simultaneously
Size:
Width/Height: Changes size, moving first right/bottom LINE if possible, else moving left/top LINE
Selection type: Action to take when double-clicking on an the Image Format's image pixel
Image format: Image format selection. Will reflect in the preview area below
Preview image format: Second image format selection, used only for image format comparisson. Will reflect in the preview area below
Hover: Color below the mouse cursor. Informational only
Selected: Single-click on a pixel to set its color to the "Selected" item. Informational only
Transparent Colors: List of colors to make transparent on the image
Transparent Pixels: List of pixels to be made transparent on the image

sect1.title: Alternate Files
sect1.para: Each alternate file can have the following properties:

listitem.para: Enabled: If checked, VIEW will generate an extra image for this area
Format: Image format properties for the alternate file
Image format: Output image format
Base filename: Base output filename
Prepend parent area filename: If checked prepends parent AREA filename, else "Base filename" will be the full output filename (without extension)
Load Preview: As there can be up to 8 alternate files, generating preview for all can be slow. If you want to see area previews, click on this button
Rows: Number of rows to slice
Columns: Number of columns to slice
Add: Adds a new file path
Edit: Edits the selected file path
Remove: Removes the selected file path
Name: File path name
Path: File path from the VIEW root path
Add: Adds a new assorted file group
Edit: Edits the selected assorted file group
Remove: Removes the selected assorted file group
Group Name: Assorted file group name
Add: Adds a new assorted file
Edit: Edits the selected assorted file
Remove: Removes the selected assorted file
Add: Adds a new CSS file
Edit: Edits the selected CSS file
Remove: Removes the selected CSS file
Name: CSS file item name
CSS text: CSS file text
File path: CSS file path (relative from VIEW output path)
Save filename: CSS file output filename (with extension)
Add: Adds a new image format
Edit: Edits the selected image format
Remove: Removes the selected image format
Auto-update: When checked, auto-update preview image based on selection
Name: Image format name
Format: Image file format
JPEG compression: Compression for the JPEG format
JPEG progressive: JPEG format progressive flag
GIF/PNG8 QUantization: Bitdepth-reducing algorithm - Xialon-Wu is faster, NewQuant is better looking but slow (default is NewQuant)
Force bit depth if possible: Force output bit depth

sect1.title: Current Areas
sect1.para: Shows the current VIEW AREAs hierarchy, and allows editing the same way as in the main screen.
